short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the 'close' button when Facebook enters Picture-in-Picture mode. By RTBRuhan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook PiP Blocker automatically closes Facebook's Picture-in-Picture (PiP) videos, preventing distractions and keeping your browsing experience clean. Simple, effective, and built for seamless Facebook use.
